title: Fancy
summary: Discover & buy amazing things. Get credit for sharing!
description: Fancy is the place for you to discover and buy amazing things curated by our global community.- Collect & Share: Fancy your favorite items, create your own wishlists, and earn credit for sharing your collection with friends.- Buy on Fancy: One app. Thousands of stores. Millions of things.- Find the perfect gift: Create a group gift, shop gift guides, send a Fancy gift card, or browse the gift recommendation engine.Fancy is optimized for tablets, phones and HD devices.Fancy supports Android Wear! - Use a voice command ("Start Fancy") to launch Fancy and browse items from your wear. - All your notifications will be displayed beautifully on your wear device, and you can interact with them (Fancy, Buy, Reply).Send feedback to android@fancy.com. Note: We collect usage data to improve the service. You may disable this function anytime in settings.
descriptionHTML:
Fancy is the place for you to discover and buy amazing things curated by our global community.

- Collect & Share: Fancy your favorite items, create your own wishlists, and earn credit for sharing your collection with friends.
- Buy on Fancy: One app. Thousands of stores. Millions of things.
- Find the perfect gift: Create a group gift, shop gift guides, send a Fancy gift card, or browse the gift recommendation engine.

Fancy is optimized for tablets, phones and HD devices.

Fancy supports Android Wear!

- Use a voice command ("Start Fancy") to launch Fancy and browse items from your wear.
- All your notifications will be displayed beautifully on your wear device, and you can interact with them (Fancy, Buy, Reply).

Send feedback to android@fancy.com.

Note: We collect usage data to improve the service. You may disable this function anytime in settings.
comments: Made a purchase through the app a month ago and have been left in tbe cold by Fancy and the vendor. No response to my email to either the vendor or the courier and Fancy do not have an easy means of contacting them. Out of pocket and very annoyed. Would not recommend making purchases through this app
Addictive scrolling, but kinda buggy. Also, wish I could get back to where I was without starting from the very beginning. Nice, clean UX, though, so no regrets.

Amazing prices awesome items. Too good to be true, mostly. That's cause most as not true. I purchased an item and waiting a very long time for it to arrive. It had not arrived I contacted support and provided a full refund. The app needs regulators or monitors to thoroughly filter the scam artists out. Good luck. Thanks for my refund, and friendly support.

This is a scam the product which cost 5000 on other apps the same exact product is above 10000 here. .. and the thing not stops after ordering product u will never get that product delivered and there is no customer care or number in this app to take our money back. ... It's a requst for Google please delete this app from play store it's a scam to take our money and giving no products it's 3 month now I didn't get my product n there is no option to comolain or get our money back. .... Plz plZ guyzzz don't waste your money you will not get your product delivered
recentChanges: - Fixed: Crash on a few devices
- Fixed: Google Pay and Samsung Pay failed silently on some edge cases.
